title: SigScale CGF: Records on the Bx interface for IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) domain

SCSCFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) serving call session control function (S-CSSF) charging data record (CDR).

PCSCFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) proxy call session control function (P-CSSF) charging data record (CDR).

ICSCFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) interogating call session control function (I-CSSF) charging data record (CDR).

MRFCRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) multimedia resource function controller (MRFC) charging data record (CDR).

MGCFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) media gateway control function (MGCF) charging data record (CDR).

BGCFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) breakout gateway control function (BGCF) charging data record (CDR).

ASRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) application server (AS) charging data record (CDR).

ECSCFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) emergency call session control function (E-CSCF) charging data record (CDR).

IBCFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) interconnection border control function (IBCF) charging data record (CDR).

TRFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) transit and roaming function (TRF) charging data record (CDR).

TFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) transit function (TF) charging data record (CDR).

ATCFRecord.description: IP multimedia subsystem (IMS) access transfer control function (ATCF) charging data record (CDR).
